Author: i-eat-bunnies
Text: Hey dude, I know EDs can distort what other people say, but "stretchy pants" alone doesn't sound like it had anything to do with your weight. Unless if I'm reading this wrong, in which case I apologise. From his perspective, he may have noticed a change in the pants you're wearing and he may have been surprised by the fabric (men's pants are usually a lot stiffer). Many people don't associate stretchiness with weight gain but rather comfort and freedom of movement, regardless of weight/eating habits. Have you tried telling him how his comment sounded?
